mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart (consumerId, productId, price, count, totalPrice) VALUES(#{consumerId}, #{productId}, #{price}, #{count}, #{totalPrice})
mapper.select: select a.id, a.consumerId, a.productId, a.price, a.count, a.totalPrice, b.title, b.stock, b.mainImageUrl from cart a left join product b on a.productId = b.id WHERE a.id in (${cartIds})
